chart.title: Monthly sea ice extent in the Antarctic
chart.subtitle: Each point represents the monthly average sea ice extent. Years in the current decade are highlighted in red, with the current year highlighted in black.
chart.note: All years have data for all 12 months, except 1987 and 1988 (each missing one month) and the current year.
chart.citation: National Snow and Ice Data Center - Sea Ice Index (2025)
